select user_id, username, nickname, phone, address, role_name, create_date, delete_date, delete_yn from members join user_role on members.role_id = user_role.role_id where 1=1 and username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into members(user_id, username, password, nickname, address, phone) values ( seq_userid.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{phone} )
